title: Average price for a soak-off gel application in nail salons in the U.S. 2010 to 2016
summary: The Average price of soak-off gel in the salons increased moderately in the 2015 's , rising from 28.68 U.S. dollars in 2010 to 36.64 U.S. dollars in 2014 .

soak-off gel A soak-off fill is a treatment for nails which already have a soak-off polish applied , and is designed to fill in the small gap that occurs between the cuticle and the base of the soak-off polish after several weeks of growth .

soak-off polishes can either be ‘ soft ' _ , where the treatment does not extend beyond the edge of the natural application , or ‘ hard ' _ , where a harder form of soak-off can be used to create application extensions .
gold: This statistic shows the average price for a soak-off gels application in nail salons in the United States from 2010 to 2016.
Nail salons charged an average price of 36.64 for an initial soak-off gel application in 2014 .
